meanings.definition: Of or relating to a panoramic photograph taken in a 360-degree circle.
meanings.sent1: The cycloramic view of the city skyline was breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: The photographer captured a stunning cycloramic image of the beach.
meanings.sent3: The cycloramic picture made the room look like a never-ending hallway.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination took a cycloramic turn as she envisioned the world in a circle.
meanings.sent5: The cycloramic photo wrapped around the viewer, immersing them in the scene.

meanings.definition: A panoramic photograph taken in a 360-degree circle.
meanings.sent1: The cycloramic displayed the entire landscape in one shot.
meanings.sent2: They hung the cycloramic on the wall to admire the full view.
meanings.sent3: The cycloramic picture made it seem like the room was spinning.
meanings.sent4: His mind felt like a cycloramic image, encompassing all perspectives.
meanings.sent5: The cycloramic photo allowed you to spin around and see every angle.
